item.title: Is this Code alright? will it work?
item.dc:creator: @DevotionPk DevotionPk
item.description:
@DevotionPk wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:440356”]Why are you using sendOption5??
That’s what’s giving you errors. For send option 5 it would be something like this (Don’t quote me on this, I haven’t done programming in a while):
sendOption5(“place1”,“place2”,“place3”,“place4”,“place5”, chatid(or npc id);[/quote]

whaaat???

And the other errors just proved that they aren't declared. But if they are, you need to import player.java and playersave.java to what ever file your using now.

I will check them.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this Code alright? will it work?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Why are you using sendOption5??
That’s what’s giving you errors. For send option 5 it would be something like this (Don’t quote me on this, I haven’t done programming in a while):
sendOption5(“place1”,“place2”,“place3”,“place4”,“place5”, chatid(or npc id);

And the other errors just proved that they aren’t declared. But if they are, you need to import player.java and playersave.java to what ever file your using now.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this Code alright? will it work?
item.dc:creator: @DevotionPk DevotionPk
item.description:
@DevotionPk wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:440356”]Well. first, is rangerMode declared anywhere? Same with magerMode?
And post errors?[/quote]
ofc in playersave and in player.java

Error: src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:896: cannot find symbol symbol : variable rangerMode location: class server.model.players.packets.ClickingButtons if (rangerMode == 1) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:898: sendOption5(java.lang .String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) in server.model.players.DialogueHandler cannot be applied to (java.lang.String) c.getDH().sendOption5("@blu@Welcome@dre@Ranger@blu@You A re now in the local Ranger home!"); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:900: cannot find symbol symbol : variable magerMode location: class server.model.players.packets.ClickingButtons } else if (magerMode == 1) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:902: sendOption5(java.lang .String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) in server.model.players.DialogueHandler cannot be applied to (java.lang.String) c.getDH().sendOption5("@blu@Welcome@dre@Warrior@blu@You Are now in the local Warrior home!"); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 4 errors Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

When i made those Variables, it didnt give errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this Code alright? will it work?
item.dc:creator: @DevotionPk DevotionPk
item.description:
@DevotionPk wrote:

case 50056: if (rangerMode == 1) { return; c.getDH().sendOption5("@blu@Welcome@dre@Ranger@blu@You Are now in the local Ranger home!"); c.getPA().movePlayer(2335, 3172, 0); } else if (magerMode == 1) { return; c.getDH().sendOption5("@blu@Welcome@dre@Warrior@blu@You Are now in the local Warrior home!"); c.getPA().movePlayer(2335, 3172, 0); break; }

Will this work? it is the Home teleport in the spellbook, it has to work like players who choosed for mage mode go to another home then the players who choose for rangermode.

it has 4 errors, but before i try fixing this i need to know if this will work

Read full topic
